trans-unit.source: Attach the drive to the system

seg-source.mrk: Attach the drive to the system

target.mrk: Attach the drive to the system

trans-unit.source: The drive needs to be attached to power cables and other cables inside the computer.

seg-source.mrk: The drive needs to be attached to power cables and other cables inside the computer.

target.mrk: The drive needs to be attached to power cables and other cables inside the computer.

trans-unit.source: You must be grounded before doing this.

seg-source.mrk: You must be grounded before doing this.

target.mrk: You must be grounded before doing this.

trans-unit.source: Find an empty bay for your drive.

seg-source.mrk: Find an empty bay for your drive.

target.mrk: Find an empty bay for your drive.

trans-unit.source: Remove the drive from its electrostatic bag.

seg-source.mrk: Remove the drive from its electrostatic bag.

target.mrk: Remove the drive from its electrostatic bag.

trans-unit.source: Screw the drive in to the frame.

seg-source.mrk: Screw the drive in to the frame.

target.mrk: Screw the drive in to the frame.

trans-unit.source: Attach the multi-colored power cord to the drive.

seg-source.mrk: Attach the multi-colored power cord to the drive.

target.mrk: Attach the multi-colored power cord to the drive.

trans-unit.source: Attach the cable that connects your hard drive to the motherboard.

seg-source.mrk: Attach the cable that connects your hard drive to the motherboard.

target.mrk: Attach the cable that connects your hard drive to the motherboard.
